example.text: In COS-7 cells cotransfected with PKA-Calpha and SOX9 expression plasmids, PKA enhanced the phosphorylation of wild-type SOX9 but did not affect phosphorylation of a SOX9 protein in which the two PKA phosphorylation sites (S (64) and S (211)) are able to be mutated.
example.arg: the two PKA phosphorylation sites (S (64) and S (211))
